text: The year 146 BCE was a year of the pre-Julian Roman calendar. At the time it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Lentulus and Achaicus (or, less often, year 608 Ab urbe condita). == Events == * Roman forces under the command of Scipio Aemilianus defeat Carthage. The city is destroyed by order of the Roman Senate. This ends the Third Punic War. *
title: 146 BC
